name: Black Wool Snood
description:
This chunky knit wool cowl also known as a snood or neck warmer simply slips over the head to keep the neck warm.  

It is stretchy so it is worn very easily. It makes a great alternative to a long scarf and it sits easily above your coat/jacket or under it. It can be worn in so many ways and even big enough to slip over the head to form a hood.

The yarn used is 100% merino wool knitted in a loose, textured and chunky knit. The wool makes the cowl extra soft and extra warm.

Width (laid flat): 11 inches (28cm)
Height(laid flat): 16 inches (40cm)

name: Tropic Swim Mini Snap Clutch
description:
The Mini Snap clutch makes a great evening bag or could easily add a nice touch to a more casual look. This one is a small/medium sized purse which will hold all of your essentials. Stylish and practical at the same time.

It is made in an African print fabric known locally as ‘Ankara. It is lined internally with a contrasting cotton fabric.

It has several layers of interfacing and batting to give it stability and to protect its contents. It will fit a phone, money, keys, make-up, camera and a lot more.

It also comes with a strap that allows you to wear it across the body or can be completely concealed if you do not want to use the strap.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the fabric, pattern placement may differ slightly from that shown in the images.

Dimensions:
Width at top: 8 inches (20cm)
Width at bottom: 9 inches (24cm)
Height: 6 inches (15cm)

name: Blue Etu Cushion
description:
A striking dark blue Aso oke cushion made in a unique traditional woven material from Nigeria, West Africa. With thin stripes of beige (Sanyan) and Maroon (Alaari) this cushion is an ode to the traditional colours of Aso-oke and would make a stunning addition to any living space. The dark blue of the cushions makes them versatile and as the line pattern on each side differs, they work beautifully in pairs or as a whole set.

Aso Oke (pronounced ah-SHOW-kay) is a loom-woven textile from Nigeria in West Africa. It is a thick fabric and similar in texture to canvas.

It is hand woven and the finished strips are usually sewn together to make clothing. The textile is worn during special occasions like weddings, festivals, coronations and so on.

Dimensions:
45cm X 45cm (18 x 18 inches)

Fabric Care:
Spot clean or Dryclean Only.

name: Alpaca XL Cowl in Midnight Blue
description:
Call it a cowl, snood, neckwarmer, anything you like! This funky accessory simply slips over the head to keep the neck protected against the cold. Its stretchy so it is worn very easily and one size fits all.

It is a practical and functional alternative to the long scarf and it can easily sit above your coat or under it and doesn’t fall off or get in the way.

The yarn used is a luxurious and sumptuous Alpaca and wool mix making it warm and soft against the skin.

Width (laid flat): 10 inches (26cm)
Height (laid flat): 16 inches (40cm)

name: Berry Stripe Tommy Tote
description:
This extra large shopper bag is made using ‘Aso-oke’ which is a loom-woven textile from Nigeria in West Africa. It is hand woven and the finished strips are usually sewn together to make clothing. 

The textile is worn during special occasions like weddings, festivals, coronations and so on making it just the perfect material to use!

It is large and roomy perfect for a day out in the park as it’ll fit your blanket and everything else. It would also make a great alternative to plastic bags for your grocery shopping. Just a few of the many possibilities of the versatile tote bag.
It is lined internally in a bright African wax print and has three large internal pockets.

Dimensions
Width: 21inches (53cm)
Height: 13 inches (33cm)
